## Who is R? Why is R?
:::{.incremental}
- R is derived off the language, S
- Along with Python, dominating bioinformatics 
- Built with statistics & biomedical data analysis in mind
- Very sophisticated graphics capabilities
- Large & supportive community of developers
- One of the best IDEs around (RStudio)
